27.eng-name: Chapters on Righteousness And Maintaining Good Relations With Relatives
27.ara-name: كتاب البر والصلة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Aishah narrated:"I was not jealous of any wife of the Prophet as I was jealous of Khadijah, and it was not because I saw her. It was only because the Messenger of Allah mentioned her so much, and because whenever he would slaughter a sheep, he would look for Khadijah's friends to gift them some of it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي حُسْنِ الْعَهْدِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Keeping Consistent Relations
